item.title: 富兰克林邓普顿认为英国收益率为 6%，并警告将出现预算倒退
item.description: 富兰克林邓普顿（Franklin Templeton）欧洲固定收益部门主管大卫-扎恩（David Zahn）表示，英国政府将竭力为支出提供资金，这将促使未来一年 30 年期金边债券的收益率升至 6%。【原文：The UK government will struggle to fund spending, helping drive the yield on 30-year gilts to 6% in the coming year, according to David Zahn, head of European fixed income at Franklin Templeton.】

item.title: 康桥力争将芯片产量提高两倍，以取代英伟达在中国的地位
item.description: Cambricon Technologies Corp.计划在2026年将其人工智能芯片产量增加两倍多，旨在从华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Cambricon Technologies Corp. plans to more than triple its production of AI chips in 2026, aiming to wrest market share from Huawei Technologies Co. in China and fill a void left by Nvidia Corp.’s forced exit.】

item.title: 英镑在四月以来最好的一天后下滑，股市将上涨
力拓新老板在战略调整中提出削减成本计划
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）宣布了一系列成本削减和改进措施，包括在明年第一季度末之前实现 6.5 亿美元的年生产力收益，以精简集团、提高效率并重新考虑非核心项目。【原文：Rio Tinto Group has announced a string of cost cuts and improvements including $650 million of annualized productivity benefits by the end of the first quarter of next year as it streamlines the group, improves efficiency and rethinks non-core projects.】

item.title: 南非股市将搭乘新兴市场大涨的顺风车，势头强劲
item.description: Momentum Investments 公司称，由于估值诱人、利润丰厚，2026 年南非股市将受益于新兴市场的广泛反弹。【原文：South African stocks will benefit from a broader rally in emerging markets in 2026 due to attractive valuations and strong profits, according to Momentum Investments.】

item.title: 软银通过 2.5 亿美元回购交易减持 InMobi 股份
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）已同意以约 2.5 亿美元的价格将其在 InMobi Pte 的大部分股份卖回给这家移动广告公司，从而解除了 2011 年创造印度首家独角兽公司的大部分投资。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. has agreed to sell a large portion of its stake in InMobi Pte back to the mobile advertising company for about $250 million, unwinding much of an investment that created India’s first unicorn in 2011.】

item.title: 沃达康以数十亿美元收购 Safaricom 的控制权
item.description: 南非最大的移动运营商沃达康集团（Vodacom Group Ltd. ）将以数十亿美元的价格收购东非最大的电信运营商 Safaricom Plc。【原文：Vodacom Group Ltd., South Africa’s biggest mobile operator, will take control of East Africa’s largest telecommunications provider Safaricom Plc in a multi-billion deal.】

item.title: 分析师称印度卢比被低估将吸引全球基金投资
item.description: Elara Capital 和 Yes Securities Ltd.认为，印度卢比在跌至历史最低点后在当前水平被低估，这可能会吸引外国投资者重返印度股市。【原文：India’s rupee is undervalued at current levels after sliding to record lows, and this could draw foreign investors back to the nation’s equities, according to Elara Capital and Yes Securities Ltd.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称欧盟将开始调查 WhatsApp 人工智能功能推广情况
item.description: 金融时报》援引两名官员的话报道称，欧盟计划对 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：The European Union plans to start an investigation into how Meta Platforms Inc. rolled out AI features within WhatsApp this year, the Financial Times reported, citing two officials.】

item.title: 美联储 12 月降息对亚洲货币可能恰逢其时
item.description: 对于一些亚洲新兴市场货币来说，人们普遍预期的美联储 12 月降息可能来得正是时候。【原文：For a number of Asia’s emerging-market currencies, the widely expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cut in December may come just in time.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚政治精英在总统选举前向中国敞开大门
item.description:
越来越多的南美国家立法者访问北京，而不是华盛顿，因为特朗普和彼得罗在争吵。【原文：

Cada vez más legisladores del país sudamericano visitan Pekín en lugar de Washington, mientras Trump y Petro intercambian pullas.

】

item.title: 哥伦比亚政治精英在选举前拥抱中国
item.description:
随着特朗普和彼得罗的互怼，越来越多的南美国家立法者开始访问北京，而不是华盛顿。【原文：

More and more lawmakers from the South American nation are visiting Beijing instead of Washington as Trump and Petro trade barbs. 

】

item.title: 欧洲生物技术佼佼者在飙升 1300% 之后面临关键的一年
item.description: 法国生物技术公司 Abivax SA 今年初的市值不到 5 亿美元。经过一轮飞速上涨后，它现在的市值已超过 80 亿美元，而且一些分析师认为它还有可能获得更大的收益。【原文：French biotech company Abivax SA started the year with a market value of less than $500 million. After a meteoric rally, it’s now worth more than $8 billion — and some analysts see the potential for even more gains.】

item.title: 首尔房价涨势延续至第 44 周，但步伐放缓
item.description: 韩国的房地产市场依然活跃，首都的公寓价格连续第 44 周上涨，这一结果支持了央行上周不放松政策的决定。【原文：South Korea’s housing market remained buoyant, with prices for apartments in the capital rising for a 44th week, a result that supports the central bank’s decision to refrain from easing policy last week.】

item.title: 报告失误后，谁将领导英国预算监督机构？
item.description: 这已成为英国最敏感的非政治性任命之一：谁将接管预算责任办公室？【原文：It’s become one of the most sensitive non-political appointments in the UK: Who is going to take over at the Office for Budget Responsibility?】

item.title: 支出超过收入，澳大利亚财政前景恶化
item.description: 根据议会预算办公室（Parliamentary Budget Office）的数据，由于联邦、州和领地政府支出的增长超过了高于预期的收入，澳大利亚的财政状况在过去一年中有所恶化。【原文：Australia’s fiscal position has deteriorated in the past year as rising expenses across federal, state and territory governments outstripped stronger-than-expected revenue, according to the Parliamentary Budget Office.】

item.title: 卢比暴跌令印度央行降息之路更加复杂：决策指南
item.description: 印度储备银行今年的最后一次利率决定被证明是最棘手的一次，政策制定者必须在创纪录的低通胀率与暴跌的货币和 8%以上的经济增长之间进行权衡。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India’s last interest rate decision of the year is proving to be one of its trickiest, with policymakers having to weigh up record low inflation against a plunging currency and 8%-plus economic growth.】

item.title: 关税让税率下降变得更加棘手
item.description:
中央银行避免了高利率带来的灾难，但新兴市场做得最好。【原文：

Central banks avoided disaster on climbing down from high rates, but emerging markets did it best.

】

item.title: 日本 30 年期债券因 2019 年以来最高拍卖需求而上涨
item.description: 日本 30 年期债券在一次拍卖会上吸引了自 2019 年以来最强劲的需求，因为收益率上升吸引了投资者。【原文：Japan’s 30-year bonds gained after an auction of that maturity drew the strongest demand since 2019 as elevated yields lured investors.】

item.title: 中国长债期货在重要政策会议召开前下滑
item.description: 由于投资者撤出固定收益基金，中国的长期债券期货大幅下跌，凸显了北京高级别政府会议前的不安情绪，这些会议可能会影响到明年的政策。【原文：China’s long-dated bond futures slumped as investors withdrew from fixed-income funds, underscoring jitters ahead of high-level government meetings in Beijing that may shape policy into next year.】

item.title: 上田表示，日本央行只能在较大范围内衡量中性利率
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，日本央行只能在一个较大的范围内估计所谓的中性利率可能在哪里，因为人们对日本央行本月再次加息的可能性越来越大。【原文：The Bank of Japan can only estimate within a wide range where the so-called neutral interest rate might reside, Governor Kazuo Ueda said, as expectations mount over the likelihood authorities will get closer to that point with another hike this month.】

item.title: 高盛称铜价 "突破 "11000 美元不会持久
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. injected some caution into the debate over copper’s prospects, saying its surge past $11,000 a ton will prove short-lived as there’s still more than enough metal to meet global demand.】

item.title: 中国猪肉价格回落表明消费者信心疲软
item.description: 中国的猪肉价格今年以来一直在下跌，而且看来还会更低，政府为扑杀种猪群所做的努力以及季节性需求的拉动都不足以阻止猪肉价格的下滑。【原文：Chinese pork prices have been in retreat all year and look set to go even lower, with government efforts to cull the breeding herd and a seasonal demand boost not enough to arrest the slide.】

item.title: 国际文传电讯社称普京将在俄罗斯会见普拉博沃
item.description: 据国际文传电讯社报道，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京将于本月晚些时候在俄罗斯会见印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin will meet with Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto in Russia later this month, according to Interfax.】

item.description:
禁止发短信。没有访客。无法逃离。她陷入了印度新的数字噩梦。【原文：

No texting. No visitors. No escape. She was caught in India’s new digital nightmare.

item.title: 高市重申 1972 年尊重中国对台湾看法的立场
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈重申了该国的一贯立场，即理解并尊重中国关于台湾是其 "领土不可分割的一部分 "的观点，但并未明确同意 "一个中国 "原则。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi reiterated the country’s long-held position that it understands and respects China’s view that Taiwan is an “inalienable part of its territory,” without specifically agreeing to the ‘One China’ principle.】

item.title: 中国发出 2022 年以来最强烈信号，要求减缓人民币升势
item.description: 中国将人民币每日参考汇率设定在明显低于预期的水平，这表明中国央行的目标是限制有管理货币的涨幅。【原文：China set its daily reference rate for the yuan at a level that was significantly weaker than estimates, suggesting the central bank is aiming to limit gains in the managed currency.】

item.title: 澳大利亚收益率因加息押注升至今年最高点
item.description: 由于越来越多的人猜测澳大利亚央行将转回加息以降低通胀，澳大利亚债券收益率升至今年最高水平。【原文：Australia’s bond yields rose to the highest level this year amid growing speculation the central bank will switch back to raising interest rates to bring down inflation.】

item.title: 日本通胀预期显示日元有进一步走软的风险
item.description: 对日本消费价格上涨的押注抑制了经通胀调整后的债券收益率，进而削弱了债券对日元的支撑能力。【原文：Bets on rising consumer prices in Japan are keeping a lid on bond yields when adjusted for inflation, in turn reducing their ability to support the yen.】
